raw_mentions:
(D) Scatchard analysis of RGM-AP binding to Neogenin expressing cells. Data from (C) are replotted. The Kd is 230 pM.
(C) Netrin- 1 does not alter the binding of RGM-AP to Neogenin. The ability of chick RGM-AP to bind to COS-7 cells expressing wild type mouse Neogenin was assessed in the presence or absence of conditioned medium containing Netrin- 1-Myc (100 nM).
